articles.description: Jack Draper’s breakout run at the US Open reaches new heights as the Briton superbly fights his way past Alex de Minaur to reach the semi-finals.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Jack Draper beats Alex de Minaur to reach semi-finals

articles.description: Nottingham Forest midfielder Morgan Gibbs-White believes England's interim coach Lee Carsley is 'perfectly suited' to the role.
articles.title: Morgan Gibbs-White: Lee Carsley is perfectly suited to England job

articles.description: A summary of Wednesday morning at the 2024 Paralympics in Paris, where Great Britain have won their 31st gold medal of the event
articles.title: Paris 2024 Paralympics: Great Britain win 31st gold on day seven in Paris

articles.description: Six players who helped England reach the Euro 2024 final are on the 30-man shortlist for the 2024 Ballon d'Or.
articles.title: Ballon d'Or: Six England players nominated for men's prize

articles.description: PGA Tour players Rory McIlroy and Scottie Scheffler will face LIV Golf stars Bryson DeChambeau and Brooks Koepka in a televised match later this year, according to reports.
articles.title: PGA players Rory McIlroy & Scottie Scheffler to face LIV stars Bryson DeChambeau & Brooks Koepka

articles.description: Czech Karolina Muchova overcomes illness to reach her second consecutive US Open semi-final with a 6-1 6-4 win over Beatriz Haddad Maia.
articles.title: US Open: Karolina Muchova beats Beatriz Haddad Maia to reach semi-finals

articles.description: Three games into the Premier League season, BBC Sport looks at what we have learned from each team so far.
articles.title: Premier League: What have we learned from every team's first three games?

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Arsenal vs Rangers in the UEFA Women's Champions League
articles.title: Arsenal vs Rangers LIVE: Women's Champions League score, line-ups, commentary & updates

articles.description: Ronnie O'Sullivan comes back from three frames down to beat Zhang Anda 6-5 and reach the quarter-finals of the inaugural Saudi Arabia Masters.
articles.title: Saudi Arabia Masters snooker: Ronnie O'Sullivan reaches quarter-finals after comeback

articles.description: England trio Lauren James, Lucy Bronze and Lauren Hemp are among the nominees for the women's Ballon d'Or, awarded to the best female footballer in 2024.
articles.title: Women's Ballon d'Or nominations: Lauren James, Lucy Bronze and Lauren Hemp nominated for award
